footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Cyno | Update Date: 10/01/2022 | Editor: ~Z~#0009

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Elemental Mastery or ATK % |<goblet>  Electro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate or CRIT DMG

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: Energy Recharge ( ~140% ER )|CRIT Rate|CRIT DMG|Elemental Mastery|ATK %

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Sacred Rite: Wolf's Swiftness
**2)** Elemental Skill: Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer
Normal Attack: Invoker's Spear does __NOT__ need to be levelled as his Electro-infused Normal and Charged attacks during his Burst status. These attacks in his Burst have a different set of multipliers based on his __Burst talent level__. Despite scaling off of Burst talent, the attacks dealt are not Burst DMG but instead NA/ CA DMG.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: A note about Thundering Fury, the set does work well for Cyno but requires a specific combo and execution or it will lose dmg against other sets. For more details, check the KQM guide.
